aws_ami.description: Creates and manages a custom Amazon Machine Image (AMI).

name.description: A region-unique name for the AMI.

description.description: A longer, human-readable description for the AMI.

ena_support.description: Specifies whether enhanced networking with ENA is enabled. Defaults to `false`.

root_device_name.description: The name of the root device (for example, `/dev/sda1`, or `/dev/xvda`).

virtualization_type.description: Keyword to choose what virtualization mode created instances

architecture.description: Machine architecture for created instances. Defaults to "x86_64".

ebs_block_device.description: Nested block describing an EBS block device that should be

ephemeral_block_device.description: Nested block describing an ephemeral block device that

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

image_location.description: Path to an S3 object containing an image manifest, e.g. created

kernel_id.description: The id of the kernel image (AKI

ramdisk_id.description: The id of an initrd image (ARI

sriov_net_support.description: When set to "simple" (the default), enables enhanced networking

device_name.description: The path at which the device is exposed to created instances.

delete_on_termination.description: Boolean controlling whether the EBS volumes created to

encrypted.description: Boolean controlling whether the created EBS volumes will be encrypted. Can't be used with `snapshot_id`.

iops.description: Number of I/O operations per second the

snapshot_id.description: The id of an EBS snapshot that will be used to initialize the created

volume_size.description: The size of created volumes in GiB.

volume_type.description: The type of EBS volume to create. Can be one of "standard" (the

kms_key_id.description: The full ARN of the AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS

virtual_name.description: A name for the ephemeral device, of the form "ephemeralN" where

id.description: The ID of the created AMI.

root_snapshot_id.description: The Snapshot ID for the root volume (for EBS-backed AMIs)
